grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 充実【ジュウジツ】fullness, completion, perfection, substantiality, enhancement, improvement, enrichment, upgrading, replenishment, repletion
リア充【リアジュウ】person who is satisfied with their real (offline) life, normie
事業拡充【ジギョウカクジュウ】business expansion
kun reading compounds: 充てる【あてる】to assign, to set aside
満たす【みたす】to satisfy (conditions, one's appetite, etc.), to meet (e.g. demands), to fulfill, to gratify, to fill (e.g. a cup), to pack, to supply
